sys_hub_flow.name: Expense Settlement Notification

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger➛User Expense Record➛Owing To➛Name,

The user Trigger➛User Expense Record➛Owned From➛Name has settled the amount Trigger➛User Expense Record➛Amount, towards the expense Trigger➛User Expense Record➛Expense Id➛Name

 

Please be informed.

 Regards,

Splitwise Support
